about_the_game: Cubicle Farter is a definitely-not-to-be-actually-followed suggestion for handling corporate "return to the office" mandates. You will return to the office on your own stinky terms. Make your co-workers choose resignation over continued employment by establishing your flatulent dominance. As the Cubicle Farter, you will collect resignation letters and use them as currency to buy items and gear, boosting your power to keep clearing offices full of increasingly angry and wily co-workers. From the quick Squeaker to the sinister Beefwhisper, fart your revenge all over the bottom line and make your corporate overlords realize that returning to the office wasn't the best idea....
detailed_description: Cubicle Farter is a definitely-not-to-be-actually-followed suggestion for handling corporate "return to the office" mandates. You will return to the office on your own stinky terms. Make your co-workers choose resignation over continued employment by establishing your flatulent dominance. As the Cubicle Farter, you will collect resignation letters and use them as currency to buy items and gear, boosting your power to keep clearing offices full of increasingly angry and wily co-workers. From the quick Squeaker to the sinister Beefwhisper, fart your revenge all over the bottom line and make your corporate overlords realize that returning to the office wasn't the best idea....
name: Cubicle Farter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86 compatible 2.3GHz or faster processor (Intel 2nd generation core i-series or equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX / AMD Equivalent
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Make the Spirit of the Bathroom proud by angering co-workers with skilled flatulence! Cubicle Farter is a humorous adventure centered around corporate culture. Lower productivity in the office with your cheeky output and defeat managers to progress through the building.
